content:
The Asturias Airport, also known as Oviedo Airport (OVD), is located approximately 40 kilometers west of Gijón. Here are some options for getting from the airport to Gijón:

1. Taxi: Taxis are readily available outside the airport terminal and can take you directly to your destination in Gijón. The journey takes around 30-40 minutes, depending on traffic, and costs approximately €50-60.
2. Bus: ALSA bus company operates regular services between the airport and Gijón, with several departures throughout the day. The journey takes approximately 45-60 minutes and costs around €8-10. You can buy tickets at the airport or online in advance.
3. Car rental: If you plan to explore the region or have a lot of luggage, renting a car is a convenient option. Several car rental companies operate at the airport, and you can book in advance or on arrival.
4. Private transfer: There are also private transfer services available that can take you directly from the airport to your accommodation in Gijón. These services can be booked in advance online or through your travel agent.

Regardless of which option you choose, it's always a good idea to check schedules and prices in advance to ensure a smooth and stress-free journey.
